content.p: The School of Geography is delighted to act as the hub for the Nottingham branch of the Geographical Association, assisting geographical education in our city and region. The branch is chaired by Dr Mary Biddulph (Lecturer in Geography Education in the School of Education), and is supported by lecturers in the School of Geography and teachers in our partnership schools. Together we hold regular lectures for local school and college students during the academic year, and have developed this website of resources to inspire the study of geography. If you are a local school and would like to join our partnership, please contact Dr Mary Biddulph and Dr Nick Clare (School of Geography) by emailing geographical.association@nottingham.ac.uk Find out if your school is on our mailing list: Dedicated materials to help you prepare for applying to university and the next step of your geographical career. Videos of short talks from staff in the School of Geography providing an insight into contemporary geographical topics. Sir Clive Granger Building University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD
